resources.string: Gopher is a network of friendly neighbors who are willing to help each other out when it comes to grocery shopping.
Help your friends out with things they need when you go out and they\'ll do the same for you when you\'re in a jam and need some urgent groceries.
See which of your friends is out shopping at the moment, and pick one to request anything from them.
Help out your friends by telling them you\'re going out and they\'ll tell you what they need.
Login now to become part of the Gopher community!
Fill in your details so your friends can contact you:
